entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Candiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
